education.studyType: Master's in Data Analysis Engineering, Process Improvement and Decision Making

highlights: As Tech Lead at Innovare Genetics, I lead the development of digital solutions while coordinating technical teams, contributing to strategic product decisions, and contributing to the European regulatory validation process for our genetic technology.

Main responsibilities: Full stack development of internal and external solutions, technical team coordination and roadmap planning, involvement in business and product strategy decisions, research and integration of new technological advances, authoring of technical and regulatory documentation (CE-IVD / MDR).
Developed neural network systems, programs, and analysis methods for cellular image analysis at the CellComM Lab.
Created advanced pipelines for analyzing various sports matches utilizing neural networks.
Mentored and assisted students in developing artificial intelligence algorithms for the 2023-2024 Akademia program.
Coordinated a trial for a biosensor for detecting SARS-CoV-2 validation at the Institute of Molecular Recognition and Technological Development.
work.company: Institute of Molecular Recognition and Technological Development

highlights: Managed team, communication, workshop promotion, and database for the Comprehensive Student Accompaniment Program (PIAE+) at the Polytechnic University of Valencia.

Conducted my Bachelor's Thesis on proteins involved in the metastatic process of lung cancer within the 'Oncogenic Signaling' research group. Responsibilities included cell culture, western blots, proliferation and wound healing assays.

Isolated a gene involved in cell cycle regulation within the 'Ionic homeostasis, cellular stress and genomics' research group. Responsibilities included genome extractions, cloning and gene expression verification.
work.company: Institute for Plant Molecular and Cellular Biology

highlights: Collaborated with management on decisions affecting the Biotechnology degree at the Polytechnic University of Valencia.
work.position: Member of the Biotechnology Academic Committee

highlights: Spoke at the UPV Open Days in 2021 and 2022, sharing experience and addressing doubts of prospective students.
Provide private tutoring for students from secondary school to university level.

awards.title: Applicability of AI and Quantum Computing

Bioethics: Law, Medicine, and Ethics of Genetics and Reproductive Technologies
Viruses and How to Beat Them. Cells, Immunity, and Vaccines
Attendee at the Annual Biotechnology Congress 2022 (BAC 2022)
Attendee at the Biomedical Research Congress 2020 (CIB 2020)

basics.name: Javier Boix Campos
basics.summary: Passionate bioinformatician and data scientist with expertise in neural networks, cell migration analysis, and genetic technology development. Currently serving as Tech Lead at Innovare Genetics, leading digital solutions development and regulatory compliance for genetic technologies.
